pages.text: Tiny, hard-to-hit, pack-hunting spiders that inflict a variety of nasty effects when hit.$(br2)Those darn critters are a real pest down here. You wouldn't be surprised if THESE were responsible for the downfall of civilizations.$(br2)Your usual approach with sword or bow doesn't help much against them, they are too fast for that. Something that does area damage is more likely to.
